content: One thought for when we have "All unreads" replacing "All messages" -- the "All unreads" view I think should just show "All caught up!" or something similar when there are no unreads. Showing the current narrow I think will be confusing in that case.
Yeah, I agree. As a sidenote, I've been finding it pretty pleasant to catch up on messages in the "Unread streams" view today.

yeah, it's a new feature being tested on czo. It's currently an easter egg in that you have to click on "All streams" in the left sidebar to get it.

One other thought is that maybe we shouldn't show unread counts on the stream name in the Unreads view?
Yeah, I think I agree with that. @Steve Howell FYI.
Maybe keep it, with different styling for stream vs topic unreads?
